lead_paragraph: The chief executive of the financial planning company LearnVest says that part of developing management skills is figuring out one’s own weaknesses. (With video.)

headline.main: Alexa von Tobel of LearnVest: No, Really, What’s Your Weakness?

snippet: The chief executive of the financial planning company LearnVest says that part of developing management skills is figuring out one’s own weaknesses. (With video.)
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Alexa von Tobel, chief executive of financial planning company LearnVest, who discusses her career and management technique.
